main event: A bright, large, stationary object was seen moving to the southwest and then returning to its original position in Columbus, New Mexico.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2 minutes,The object was observed by a pilot at an altitude of 45,000 feet,The object was estimated to be between 15,300 to 22,200 feet above the pilot,The document suggested the object may have been a probable balloon,The weather during the observation was clear with visibility of 60 miles.
